errors.error_description: Removed the angle brackets from the shell completion command, causing incorrect command substitution syntax
Changed the pipe placement in shell completion command, creating incorrect syntax that would not work properly
correction_candidates: The command should use process substitution with angle brackets to properly source the completion script
Shell completion requires proper command substitution syntax with parentheses inside angle brackets
The pipe operator should be inside the process substitution, not outside the source command
Process substitution syntax requires the entire command to be enclosed within angle brackets
errors.golden_answer: The pipe operator should be inside the process substitution, not outside the source command
